body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Russell Turner and I'm from Speedy Auto Sales. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Heather. Could you please provide me with your phone number, starting with the area code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is five five five - two three four - one zero zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I also have your email address, just to keep you updated on our inventory?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Heather. We'll make sure to keep you informed about our latest deals. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Heather. Thank you for your time and have a great day!
